mapper.insert: insert into post_category (name, description, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{description}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update post_category set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, create_time, update_time from post_category limit #{page}, #{size}
select c.id, c.name from post_category c inner join post_category_relation ac on c.id = ac.category_id where ac.post_id = #{postId}
select id, name, create_time, update_time from post_category limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
select id, name, description, create_time, update_time from post_category where name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by create_time desc
